# Reports Indices

```{r echo = F, layout = "l-page"}
report_galleries <- tibble::tibble(
  location = c("Mississippi May ANA #3",
               "Mississippi April Teacher-Level Reports",
               "Mississippi March Teacher-Level Reports"),
  long_name = location,
  image_url = c(here::here("Images/Reports/Mississippi/April/Mississippi_reports_april.png"),
                here::here("Images/Reports/Mississippi/April/Mississippi_reports_april.png"),
                here::here("Images/Reports/Mississippi/March/Mississippi_reports_march.png")),
  link = c("Reports/mississippi_reports/May/mississippi_pre_post_report.html",
           "mississippi_reports_april_21_22.html",
           "mississippi_reports_march_21_22.html")
)

report_galleries %>%
  cards(
    title = "Reports",
    footer = long_name,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    width = 2,
    layout = "inset-bottom",
    spacing = 3
  )
```
